Methods.Name: Get Contact
Methods.Description: Gets details of the specified contact.

Methods.Name: Update Contact
Methods.Description: Updates a Contact in the CRM.

Methods.Name: Delete Contact
Methods.Description: Deletes a Contact in the CRM.

Methods.Name: Find Contacts by Email
Methods.Description: Returns a list of contacts searching by Email Address.

Methods.Name: Find Contacts by Last Name
Methods.Description: Returns a list of contacts searching by Last Name.

Methods.Name: Find Contacts For Account
Methods.Description: Returns a list of contacts for the specified account.

Methods.Name: List Contacts
Methods.Description: Gets a list of contacts from the CRM.

Methods.Name: Create Contact
Methods.Description: Creates a new Contact in the CRM.

Methods.Name: Get Account
Methods.Description: Gets the specified Account from the CRM.

Methods.Name: List Accounts
Methods.Description: Gets a list of Accounts from the CRM.

Methods.Name: Get User
Methods.Description: Gets details of an Administrate Users.

Methods.Name: List Users
Methods.Description: Gets a list of Administrate Users.

Methods.Name: Get Company
Methods.Description: Gets details of the specified Company.

Methods.Name: List Companies
Methods.Description: Gets a list of Companies.

Methods.Name: Get Enquiry
Methods.Description: Gets details of the specified Enquiry from the CRM.

Methods.Name: List Enquiries
Methods.Description: Gets a list of Enquiries from the CRM.

Methods.Name: Get Marketing Activity
Methods.Description: Gets the specified Marketing Activity.

Methods.Name: List Marketing Activities
Methods.Description: Gets a list of Leads.

Methods.Name: Get Campaign
Methods.Description: Gets a specified Marketing Campaign.

Methods.Name: List Campaigns
Methods.Description: Gets a list of Campaigns.

Methods.Name: Get Tasks For Contact
Methods.Description: Gets Tasks associated to the specified contact.

Methods.Name: Get Task
Methods.Description: Gets Details of the specified Task.

Methods.Name: List Tasks
Methods.Description: Gets a list of Tasks.

Methods.Name: Create Marketing Lists
Methods.Description: Creates a new Marketing List.
